list_of_divinities.name: Apollo
list_of_divinities.info: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

list_of_divinities.name: Artemis
list_of_divinities.info: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

list_of_divinities.name: Athena
list_of_divinities.info: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

list_of_divinities.name: Atlas
list_of_divinities.info: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

list_of_divinities.name: Chronus
list_of_divinities.info: Win Condition: You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board.

list_of_divinities.name: Demeter
list_of_divinities.info: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

list_of_divinities.name: Hephaestus
list_of_divinities.info: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

list_of_divinities.name: Hestia
list_of_divinities.info: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.

list_of_divinities.name: Minotaur
list_of_divinities.info: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

list_of_divinities.name: Pan
list_of_divinities.info: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

list_of_divinities.name: Poseidon
list_of_divinities.info: End of Your Turn: If your unmoved Worker is on the ground level, it may build up to three times.

list_of_divinities.name: Prometheus
list_of_divinities.info: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

list_of_divinities.name: Triton
list_of_divinities.info: Your Move: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

list_of_divinities.name: Zeus
list_of_divinities.info: Your Build: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
